text: hey <@UDPA7JFHA> — `hs_editor_style` means it came from the page editor. in this case it looks the “body styles” section was edited on the page itself
so you won’t find it in a template — just that one page
(if you are looking at the updated editor, body styles will now appear under the top level “design” tab in the side bar)
I was looking under that section but did not see anywhere that I could modify the font for an h4 tag. It looks like having “light” selected affects all fonts, not just the body p style?
